design_patterns.question: Which design pattern is used to provide a surrogate or placeholder for another object?
Which design pattern is used to ensure a class has only one instance and provides a global point of access to it?
Which design pattern is used to separate the construction of an object from its representation, allowing the same construction process to create various representations?
Which design pattern is used to define a family of algorithms, encapsulate each one, and make them interchangeable at runtime?
Which design pattern is used to provide a way to access the elements of an aggregate object sequentially without exposing its underlying representation?

angular.question: What is Angular?
answers: A framework for building web applications
angular.correct_answer: A framework for building web applications

angular.question: What is TypeScript?
answers: A markup language for web development

angular.question: What is dependency injection in Angular?
answers: A design pattern to manage software dependencies
A technique to inject CSS styles into Angular components
A mechanism to inject data into Angular templates
A way to inject services or objects into components
angular.correct_answer: A way to inject services or objects into components

angular.question: What is an Angular component?
answers: A reusable building block for UI elements
A virtual representation of a web page
A function that performs a specific task in Angular
angular.correct_answer: A reusable building block for UI elements

angular.question: What is Angular CLI?
answers: A command-line interface for Angular development
A graphical user interface for Angular development
A cloud-based development environment for Angular
A testing framework for Angular applications
angular.correct_answer: A command-line interface for Angular development

java.question: What is the main feature of Java?
What is the purpose of the Java Virtual Machine (JVM)?
answers: To manage memory in Java applications

java.question: What is an object in Java?
What is an exception in Java?
answers: An error condition that occurs during program execution
A reserved keyword in the Java language
A method for handling user input
java.correct_answer: An error condition that occurs during program execution
